meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a sulfur atom and a nitrogen atom in a six-membered ring structure.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study thiazins to understand their chemical properties.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician identified various thiazins under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The thiazins in the beaker decided to throw a party to bond over their shared elements.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, thiazins stand out like colorful gems in a sea of plain stones.
meanings.sent5: The textbook vividly described the intricate structure of thiazins for the students to remember.
